message: I'm excited to offer you this incredible product at a special price. I think you'll find it's worth every penny!
I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $8000. I'm willing to make a serious offer, but I need to stay within my budget.

I understand you're looking to stay within your budget, but I'm confident this product is worth more than that. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit. How about we meet at $11000?

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to pay $9500 for the product. I think that's a fair price considering the value it will bring to me.
I understand you're trying to negotiate, but I'm not willing to go as low as $9500. I'm willing to make one more concession, but I need to get closer to my target. How about we meet at $10500?

I appreciate your willingness to make concessions, but I'm still not comfortable with $10500. I'm willing to meet you at $10000, which is the price I'm willing to pay. If you can meet me there, I'm ready to make a deal.
